abstract: Chinese government accuses seven American solar companies of protectionism in filing a complaint against solar panel imports from China; American firms call for steep tariffs.
snippet: The Chinese government told the United States that giving in to a request by the American solar panel industry for steep tariffs would hurt the global economy.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese government told the United States that giving in to a request by the American solar panel industry for steep tariffs would hurt the global economy.

headline.main: China Charges Protectionism in Call for Solar Panel Tariffs
headline.print_headline: China Charges Protectionism In Call for Solar Panel Tariffs
headline.seo: China Denounces Demand for High Tariffs on Solar Panels
